channel.title: Npc... Allies? [Delta 317]
channel.description:
Hi there, Was wondering if It's at all possible to: Spawn an npc when you equip a certain item, and [once spawned that Npc Helps you kill other npcs] - (This is the part i'm struggling with.)
I'm not the best with this sort of thing... If you guys have any ideas, feel free to comment.
Thanks for looking.

item.title: Npc... Allies? [Delta 317]
item.dc:creator: @Beemobmo71 Beemobmo71
item.description:
@Beemobmo71 wrote:

Uncalled:

Considering you are wanting this for Delta - there definitely will be no tutorial to do so, nor anyone here to spoon feed you this. But to answer your question; yes it is possible. Good luck, fine sir.

I know it’s possible, In fact I know how to make an npc spawn when you equip an item. However, the making it attack another npc along side a player is the issue i’m having.

Read full topic
